name: Material Design List Items
description:
This community resource serves as a companion file to a Bootcamp article about extending Material Design's ListItem component.


Use the ðŸ•¹ Playground page in this file to customize an individual list item by adding an overline, a secondary text, and any combination of leading and trailing items. Alternatively, you can copy the component to your own project and customize it there. This component supports Auto Layout and Variants.


Check out the React library, mui-listitem-extended and demo app.


Developer Credit: Adam Wattis.
